version_description:
Thank you for using the Azure app. Our updates include performance improvements and bug fixes to make the app faster and more reliable. 

In this version, you can also find the following enhancements:
• Improved resource list sorting
• Favorite star is now more discoverable in resource details
• Easily navigate to the top of the list when tapping on the selected tab
• UI improvements throughout (e.g. icons, section sizes, colors)

Let us know how we can improve the app for you! We’d love to hear from you.

• UI improvements throughout (e.g. icons, section sizes, colors)

Thank you for using the Azure app. In this new update, you will find exciting improvements:

•Browsing all resources in a single directory is now available! Enable this feature on the Settings menu. With this feature, we’ve added a brand new, powerful filter in the resources list view.
•Unified schema alerts for push notifications! Make sure to try them out by setting up Alerts in the portal.

Our regular updates include performance improvements and bug fixes to make the app faster and more reliable.

Please reach out to us for any questions, concerns, or feature requests.

Let us know how we can improve the app! We'd love to hear from you.

Please reach out to us for any questions, concerns, or feature requests.

Thank you for using the Azure app. Our regular updates include performance improvements and bug fixes to make the app faster and more reliable. This version includes:


* New Subscriptions list for easier access to all your subscriptions info
* New Cost Management section now shows current costs for supported subscriptions.

Please reach out to us for any questions, concerns, or feature requests.

The Azure mobile app has a brand-new experience! The new Home view provides a powerful new summary lens that empowers you to stay connected with your Azure environment on the go. 

The new Home experience includes support for:
•Recent resources
•Latest alerts
•Favorites
•Service Health
•Resource groups

You can also customize your Home experience by rearranging cards, as well as turning them on or off.

Now you can browse all your resources across subscriptions by default. Try out the new powerful filters in the resources view to tailor your experience.

Thank you for using the Azure app. Please reach out to us for any questions, concerns, or feature requests. We'd love to hear from you.

The Azure mobile app has a brand-new experience! The new Home view provides a powerful new summary lens that empowers you to stay connected with your Azure environment on the go. 

The new Home experience includes support for:
•Recent resources
•Latest alerts
•Favorites
•Service Health
•Resource groups

You can also customize your Home experience by rearranging cards, as well as turning them on or off.

Now you can browse all your resources across subscriptions by default. Try out the new powerful filters in the resources view to tailor your experience.
